name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Full-Stack Engineer with 8 years of hands-on experience, I excel in utilizing **TypeScript**, **React**, **Node.js**, and **Postgres** to develop high-performance applications that meet dynamic user needs. My expertise in **GraphQL** enhances data fetching efficiency while leveraging **Redis** for optimized caching solutions. I thrive in Agile environments, effectively collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver impactful solutions driven by design thinking and customer research.

I have a strong foundation in full-stack development, bringing proficiency in both front-end and back-end technologies, including **JavaScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. My cloud experience encompasses deploying and managing applications on **Azure** and **AWS**. I’ve successfully launched enterprise-grade platforms with integrated AI/ML features, aligning with compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. With hands-on experience in CI/CD automation and microservices architecture, I focus on building robust and secure applications while implementing MLOps workflows with tools like MLflow, Airflow, and Kubeflow.
